title: About Me
text:
Hello! I'm Kasim Pasaoglu, based in Turkey and actively learning front-end development since May 1, 2024. While my primary focus has been on front-end technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I am now expanding my expertise into full-stack development with a focus on C# and .NET technologies. My passion for coding drives me to constantly explore new tools and techniques that can enhance both the user experience and back-end functionality.

Although I am still a student in this field, I am committed to mastering both front-end and back-end technologies to become a well-rounded developer. By combining my growing technical expertise with a problem-solving mindset, I aim to deliver efficient and scalable solutions. Follow my journey as I continue to build skills, take on new challenges, and develop innovative projects in the world of web development.
